column2: GM says ISS advises against Greenlight share plan
column3: board nominees General Motors Co said on Saturday that proxy advisory firm Institutional Shareholder Services has recommended that shareholders vote against a slate of directors proposed by hedge fund Greenlight Capital and reject the hedge fund's plan to divide GM shares into two classes. ~GM says ISS advises against Greenlight share plan
